name: 科里·马赫

last_movies.title: 联邦调查局 第五季
中年失恋日记 第一季
罪恶黑名单 第九季

introduction: 科里·马赫除了在电视/电影中出演过角色，科里还在《百老汇》中出演过《古怪的靴子》、《强健的体魄》和《上帝的复活》。在巡回演出中，他主演了《邪恶》、《歌舞青春》和《出租》。在百老汇之外，他曾在第二阶段领导过“隐形线”公司，在La MaMa领导过Chix 6公司。地区首演包括莎拉·巴莱勒斯的《美国话剧团的女招待》、《奥贡奎特剧院的神秘比萨饼》、《米勒夫人在签名剧院与戴布拉·莫克和博伊德·盖恩斯演对手戏》(由詹姆斯·拉派恩执导)、蒂姆·莱斯的《从这里到永恒》在手指湖音乐戏剧节上演，以及《巴黎圣母院的驼背》在大湖剧院和爱达荷莎士比亚剧院上演。科里也是广受好评的纽约音乐会系列“百老汇歌唱”的创作者和导演，该系列音乐会现已进入第十个年头。Corey Mach In addition to TV/film credits, Corey has appeared on Broadway in Kinky Boots, Hands on a Hardbody, and the revival of Godspell. On tour, he has starred in Wicked, Flashdance the Musical, and Rent. Off-Broadway he has led the companies of Invisible Thread at Second Stage and Chix 6 at La MaMa. Regional premieres include Sara Bareilles' Waitress at American Repertory Theater, Mystic Pizza at Ogunquit Playhouse, Mrs. Miller Does Her Thing opposite Debra Monk & Boyd Gaines at Signature Theatre (directed by James Lapine), Tim Rice's From Here to Eternity at Finger Lakes Musical Theatre Festival, and "Quasimodo" in The Hunchback of Notre Dame at Great Lakes Theater & Idaho Shakespeare. Corey also is the creator and director of the acclaimed NYC concert series Broadway Sings, now in its tenth year.
